name: WerkPress Theme Customization Request
author: Werkpress

sections.description: This plugin adds a widget to the WordPress dashboard that allows users to submit a theme customization request from within WordPress itself, rather than having to visit werkpress.com. Come to think of it, you should visit us there anyway.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the zip file to the /wp-content/plugins directory and unzip it.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to your WordPress Dashboard and find the new widget. Click and drag it to a convenient location, if desired.
sections.faq:
Does WerkPress do anything weird or evil with my contact information?

No way. We will use your email address to contact you about your customization request and nothing more.
sections.changelog:
0.5.2b

  • Removed old callback function that is no longer needed.

0.5.1b

  • Fixed array declaration error for earlier versions of PHP (before PHP 5.4.x).

0.5b

  • Initial beta version.

short_description: Adds a dashboard widget that allows users to request a WerkPress theme customization from within WordPress.
description: This plugin adds a widget to the WordPress dashboard that allows users to submit a theme customization request from within WordPress itself, rather than having to visit werkpress.com. Come to think of it, you should visit us there anyway.
